name: Fortinet FortiGate
description:
This is a content pack containing extractors, dashboards and input to get useful information out of a FortiGate firewall.  The input defaults to listen on UDP 30000.  Tested on FortiOS 5.4 but should work with FortiOS 5.2.

The extractors were done in regular expressions.  I may update this content pack in the future with Grok extractors as time permits.  Feel free to contribute.

Special thank you to Dustin Shaw at http://www.virtualizetheworld.com/ for guidance on creating the extractors.

dashboards.title: FortiGate Network Activity - Last 24 Hours
dashboards.description: Overview of network activity detected by the FortiGate

dashboards.title: FortiGate Threat Summary - Last 24 Hours
dashboards.description: Overview of threats in the last day detected by FortiGate

configuration.query: source:fwf92d3g14000548 AND subtype:webfilter AND catdesc:("Malicious Websites" Phishing "Spam URLs")

dashboards.title: FortiGate Web Activity - Last 24 Hours
dashboards.description: Overview of web activity detected by FortiGate

dashboards.title: FortiGate System Activity - Last 24 Hours
dashboards.description: Overview of System Activity on FortiGate
